name: Cat's Curse
description:
This game is an entry for GBA Winter Jam '23.

The goal of the jam is to create a game with main focus on the title screen.

As for the actual game, I decided to write a little card memory game just for experimental purposes, don't expect too much.

Note! There is a visual glitch in the browser emulator that prevents rendering the inner ring in the title screen. That shouldn't happen on hardware/other emulators.
